field.name: HardwarePrefetcher
field.desc: Lightly threaded applications and some benchmarks can benefit from having the hardware prefetcher enabled.

field.name: AdjacentCacheLinePrefetch
field.desc: Lightly threaded applications and some benchmarks can benefit from having the hardware prefetcher enabled.

field.name: DCUStreamerPrefetcher
field.desc: Lightly threaded applications and some benchmarks can benefit from having the hardware prefetcher enabled.

field.name: DCUIpPrefetcher
field.desc: DCU IP prefetcher is typically best left enabled for most environments. Some environments may benefit from having it disabled (e.g. Java).

register.name: VR_MISC_CONFIG
register.desc: This register is used to define the load characteristics of the Primary power plane.

field.name: IOUT_SLOPE
field.desc: This is a slope correction for VR dIout readings for positive/negative correction.
